posts.title: NYPL Events: What's Happening 4/16–4/29
posts.text: Welcome to our bi-weekly update on events happening during the next two weeks at The New York Public Library. With 92 locations across New York City, there's a lot going on!

posts.title: NYPL Events: What's Happening 4/2–4/15
posts.text: With 92 locations across New York City, there's a lot going on! We're highlighting some of our events here, including author talks, free classes, community art shows, performances, concerts, and exhibitions.

posts.title: National Poetry Month Upcoming Events
posts.text: National Poetry Month is here and we have no shortage of events that praise the art of poetry. Take a look at this event round-up to find out how to celebrate poetry at your NYPL location.

posts.title: NYPL Events: What's Happening 3/19 - 4/1
posts.text: Welcome to our bi-weekly update on events happening during the next two weeks at The New York Public Library. We're highlighting some of our events here, including author talks, free classes, community art shows, performances, concerts, and exhibitions

posts.title: Women's History Month Events at NYPL
posts.text: Throughout March our branches will be holding book discussions, movie screenings, workshops and musical performances highlighting the many successful women worldwide, both past and present.

posts.title: Black History Month 2019 Upcoming Events
posts.text: How are you celebrating Black History Month this year? Our branches will be holding events and workshops throughout February.

posts.title: International Creativity Month Upcoming Events
posts.text: International Creativity Month is upon us. Why not take a look at some workshops that will unleash your creative side?

posts.title: Where to Start with Haruki Murakami
posts.text: Initially only having interest in reading books, he was inspired to write by an experience at a baseball game in Tokyo. From there, he went on to write books in genres extending from short stories to nonfiction pieces.

posts.title: National Novel Writing Month (NaNoWriMo) Upcoming Workshops
posts.text: With National Novel Writing Month upon us, take a look at some upcoming writing workshops to help you get inspired.
